de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities

Class AnimationViewCV.GestureListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
      • de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities.AnimationViewCV.GestureListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.GestureDetector.OnContextClickListener, android.view.GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener, android.view.GestureDetector.OnGestureListener
    Enclosing class:
    AnimationViewCV

    public static class AnimationViewCV.GestureListener
extends android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
    Class for gesture listeners that can be registered with an AnimationViewCV object and that will be called by its gesture detector when a gesture is detected. Override the methods of this class for the gestures you wish to handle.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<AnimatedGuiObjectCV> guiobjects
      GUI objects on which the gesture occurred (or null if there is no such object).
      protected AnimationViewCV view
      View for which this listener is registered.

    • Field Detail

      • view

        protected AnimationViewCV view
        View for which this listener is registered. This attribute may be accessed from subclasses.

      • guiobjects

        protected java.util.ArrayList<AnimatedGuiObjectCV> guiobjects
        GUI objects on which the gesture occurred (or null if there is no such object). This attribute is set by the onXXX() methods defined here and may be accessed from subclasses. NB: This attribute is useful if you do not want to find out the relevant GUI objects. in your own methods that override the methods defined here. However, your methods must then call the methods defined here by super.onXXX().
